meanings.definition: Not saintly; lacking in holiness or virtue.
meanings.sent1: Her behavior was unsaintly, as she lied and cheated without remorse.
meanings.sent2: The unsaintly man was known for his selfish and dishonest actions.
meanings.sent3: Despite his unsaintly behavior, he always managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The unsaintly deeds of the villain left a trail of destruction in their wake.
meanings.sent5: The unsaintly aura surrounding him made others uneasy in his presence.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to the qualities or characteristics of a saint.
meanings.sent1: The unsaintly painting depicted a dark and sinister scene.
meanings.sent2: Her unsaintly laughter echoed through the empty halls of the castle.
meanings.sent3: The unsaintly cat knocked over the vase and then sauntered away, unapologetic.
meanings.sent4: The unsaintly storm raged outside, matching the turmoil within her heart.
meanings.sent5: The unsaintly mask concealed his true intentions, fooling those around him.
